DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : Efficacy : To assess progression-free survival rate 10 month patient maintenance therapy capecitabine plus aflibercept . Secondary Objectives : To evaluate : - Efficacy : Progression Free Survival ( PFS ) - Efficacy : Overall Survival ( OS ) - Efficacy : Objective Response Rate ( ORR ) per Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors ( RECIST version 1.1 ) criterion - Health related Quality Life ( HRQL ) : EORTC QLQ-C30 score EQ5D-3L - Safety Exploratory Objective : To collect blood tumor sample perform investigation potential biomarker testing .
